00034 /*************************************************************************/
00042 /*************************************************************************/
00043 void InitializeEnemy(struct Enemy *CurrentEnemy)
00044 {
00045         //Creates the enemy sprite
00046         CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite = CreateSprite("Enemy", "TextureFiles/EasyEnemy.png", 150.0f, 150.0f, 8, 8, 1);
00047 
00048         //Animation properties
00049         CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->AnimationActive = 1;
00050         CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->AnimationSpeed = 6;
00051 
00052         //Collision properties
00053         CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->SpriteType = EnemyType;
00054         CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->CanCollide = 1;
00055 
00056         //Starting position
00057         CurrentEnemy->Position.x = 300.0f;
00058         CurrentEnemy->Position.y = 0.0f;
00059 
00060         //Physics variables initialized
00061         CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Static = FALSE;
00062         CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Mass = 10;
00063         CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Drag = 0.5;
00064         CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Area = CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->Width * CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->Height;
00065         CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Density = CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Mass / CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Area;
00066 
00067         //Initialize physics systems
00068         SetGravity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody, 0.0f, -15.0f);
00069         ZeroAcceleration(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody);
00070         SetVelocity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00071 }

00073 /*************************************************************************/
00081 /*************************************************************************/
00082 void UpdateEnemy(Enemy *CurrentEnemy)
00083 {
00084         //Check if enemy is on the floor
00085         if(CurrentEnemy->Position.y <= -225)
00086         {
00087                 ZeroAcceleration(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody);
00088                 ZeroVelocity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody);
00089                 ZeroGravity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody);
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093                 SetGravity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody, 0.0f, -15.0f);
00094         }
00095 
00096         //Updates velocity and position
00097         UpdateVelocity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody);
00098         Vec2Add(&CurrentEnemy->Position, &CurrentEnemy->Position, &CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody.Velocity);
00099         CurrentEnemy->EnemySprite->Position = CurrentEnemy->Position;
00100 }

00102 /*************************************************************************/
00113 /*************************************************************************/
00114 void EnemyLogic(Enemy *CurrentEnemy, Player *CurrentPlayer)
00115 {
00116         LogicTimer++;
00117 
00118         //Resets the logic timer
00119         if(LogicTimer > 180)
00120         {
00121                 LogicTimer = 0;
00122         }
00123         //Move enemy toward player
00124         else if(LogicTimer > 60)
00125         {
00126                 if(CurrentPlayer->Position.x > CurrentEnemy->Position.x)
00127                         CurrentEnemy->Position.x += 2;
00128                 else
00129                         CurrentEnemy->Position.x -= 2;
00130         }
00131         //Randomly have the enemy jump
00132         if(LogicTimer == (int)(rand() / 180) && CurrentEnemy->Position.y <= -225.0f)
00133         {
00134                 Vec2 velocity;
00135                 Vec2Set(&velocity, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00136                 if(CurrentEnemy->Position.y < -225)
00137                         Vec2Set(&CurrentEnemy->Position, CurrentEnemy->Position.x, -224.9f);
00138                 ApplyVelocity(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody, &velocity);
00139         }
00140         else
00141         {
00142                 ZeroAcceleration(&CurrentEnemy->EnemyRigidBody);
00143         }
00144 
00145 
00146 }
